attributes.action: Make 'ALL' vehicle's using Motorways 'Display' the Max Speed on the rear like 60
attributes.additional_details: M5 and M6 plus M4 have major issues as the Police do not take this very serious but should on road safety as a number have turned over on the M5 causing major issues, speed kills and ALL accidents someone causes them as they just do not happen.
attributes.background: Have seen many going well in excess and swaying due to not being level and so not easy to control, All used to display their Max speed but not anymore, Speed Kills with each accident taking money from the Services funds instead of other uses.

rejection.details:
We're not quite sure what change you would like to see. We are not sure whether you would like this requirement to apply to all cars, or only to those vehicles (like HGVs) which have different limits. 

We are also not sure which "max speed" you would like to be displayed.

If you could make your petition clearer, we could look at it again.
